## About me
I am Tenured Assistant Professor (cat: _Professor Agregat_) at the **Department of Service and Information System Engineering** ([ESSI](http://www.essi.upc.edu/)), **Barcelona Tech** ([UPC](http://www.upc.edu/)). My current research interests include Software and Services Engineering, APIs, and Smart Cities. I am teaching Web Engineering courses at the **Barcelona School of Informatics** ([FIB](http://www.fib.upc.edu/fib.html))

## Teaching
#### Web Applications and Services (GRAU-ASW)
This course is part of the [Bachelor Degree in Informatics Engineering](http://www.fib.upc.edu/en/estudiar-enginyeria-informatica/enginyeries-pla-2003/EI.html). It is compulsory for the [Specialization in Software Engineering](http://www.fib.upc.edu/en/estudiar-enginyeria-informatica/especialitats-grau/enginyeria-del-software.html).

More info: [Syllabus Page](http://www.fib.upc.edu/en/estudiar-enginyeria-informatica/assignatures/ASW.html)

#### Web Services (WS-MIRI)
This course is part of two Master's Degree programs:
+ [Master in Innovation and Research in Informatics](http://www.fib.upc.edu/en/masters/miri.html). Compulsory for the [Specialization in Service Engineering](http://www.fib.upc.edu/en/masters/miri/services-engineering.html).
+ [Erasmus Mundus European Master in Information Technologies for Business Intelligence](http://it4bi.univ-tours.fr/). Compulsory fot the [Specialization in Service-Oriented Business Intelligence](http://it4bi.univ-tours.fr/home/master-programme/course-content/).

More info: [Syllabus Page](http://www.fib.upc.edu/en/masters/miri/syllabus.html?assig=WS-MIRI)
